body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Julia Hutchison Chowning in Bourbon County, Kentucky, on November 29, 1821. Married to Letha Lowe Chowning in Pendleton County on November 20, 1856. Lumber merchant in Covington, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Covington in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Falmouth, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.
